name: @example/zig-canvas
description: Zig-based DOM creation & canvas drawing app
author: Karsten Schmidt <k+npm@thi.ng>

scripts.build:zig-small: zig build-lib -O ReleaseSmall -target wasm32-freestanding -dynamic --strip --pkg-begin wasmapi ../../node_modules/@thi.ng/wasm-api/include/wasmapi.zig --pkg-end --pkg-begin dom ../../node_modules/@thi.ng/wasm-api-dom/include/dom.zig --pkg-end zig/main.zig
scripts.build:zig-post: wasm-opt main.wasm -o main.wasm -O3 --enable-simd && wasm-dis -o main.wast main.wasm && cp main.wasm src/main.wasm
